articles.title: A new partnership between McAvoy, Zadorov has Bruins defense regaining some bite
articles.description:
"He's able to physically dominate guys — which I think is his superpower."

The post A new partnership between McAvoy, Zadorov has Bruins defense regaining some bite appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: McAvoy and Zadorov's partnership strengthens Bruins' defense ahead of the season.
Zadorov's physical play enhances team dynamics, crucial for upcoming games.
Boston fans can expect improved performance as Bruins aim for playoff contention.

articles.title: How Jeremy Swayman responded after tweak in Bruins goalie rotation
articles.description:
"When you're losing, you're not getting the results you want, it's a huge motivator. And then when you're winning, it's the same thing."

The post How Jeremy Swayman responded after tweak in Bruins goalie rotation appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jeremy Swayman adapts to changes in Bruins' goalie rotation amid team struggles.
Swayman emphasizes motivation from both winning and losing games this season.
Local fans hope Swayman's performance will boost Bruins' standings in the NHL.
